content: if you can single_crochet in the round you can make these lil mushrooms seriously with just 8 quick row and a sprinkle of stuffing they come together fast and are beginner-friendly without being boring while i turned mine into earrings they d also make adorable mushroom keychains plushie pals if you size up the yarn or sweet little accents on whatever you re stitching up next the possibilities for these little guys are endless gauge is not important for this pattern i used worsted weight yarn and a 2 0mm crochet hook
